## Events.BlockDrag.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `BlockDrag` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(opt_block?: Block, opt_isStart?: boolean, opt_blocks?: Block[]);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_block | [Block](./blockly.block.md) | _(Optional)_ The top block in the stack that is being dragged. Undefined for a blank event. |
|  opt\_isStart | boolean | _(Optional)_ Whether this is the start of a block drag. Undefined for a blank event. |
|  opt\_blocks | [Block](./blockly.block.md)<!-- -->\[\] | _(Optional)_ The blocks affected by this drag. Undefined for a blank event. |
